title: The Promised Land
description: After years of struggling within a dysfunctional family, Wake Reynolds must decide if there's a limit to what he would be willing to sacrifice to save his mother from unimaginable pain and suffering."The Promised Land" is a short story prequel to "Our Souls to Keep". "Our Souls to Keep" is now available on Amazon, Barnes&Noble, and iTunes!Receive a FREE download of "The Promised Land" at www.garycarusobooks.com.
author: Gary A. Caruso
